backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping each product feature (hero, nav, about, tokenomics, how-to-buy, etc.) to their implementing files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose and key contents.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, card, border, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app titled 'The Pointless Coin', mounting the app at the #root div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that assembles the full page by composing Navigation, HeroSection, TickerBanner, AboutSection, TokenomicsSection, HowToBuySection, RoadmapSection, CommunitySection, and Footer in order.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Two-column section featuring the coin image with floating badges and humorous meme-style copy explaining the coin's intentional lack of utility, with tag pills like 'No Utility' and '100% Vibes'.
frontend/src/components/CommunitySection: Community section with social platform cards for X, Telegram, and Discord plus a large CTA banner with Buy/Join buttons encouraging users to join the 'Pointless Army'.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand logo, quick-link navigation, social icon links, a legal disclaimer about meme coin risks, dynamic copyright year, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the landing page hero section with a floating coin image, animated star particles, headline, ticker symbol, tagline, and CTA buttons that smooth-scroll to target sections.
Displays a four-step guide (create wallet, get ETH, swap on Uniswap, hold) for purchasing $POINTLESS, laid out in a responsive grid with icons and connector lines.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with smooth-scroll links, a logo, a 'Buy $POINTLESS' CTA button, and a collapsible mobile menu that gains a backdrop blur on scroll.
frontend/src/components/RoadmapSection.t: Shows a four-phase roadmap (complete, active, upcoming, upcoming) in a two-column grid, each card listing milestone items with status badges and humorous notes.
frontend/src/components/TickerBanner.tsx: Horizontally scrolling marquee banner that continuously displays repeated $POINTLESS promotional slogans using a CSS ticker animation.
frontend/src/components/TokenomicsSectio: Presents four key tokenomics stats (1B supply, 0% tax, 100% liquidity locked, 0% team allocation) in a card grid alongside a copyable contract address display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor or identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Google Fonts and Tailwind directives, defining CSS custom properties for a dark gold-themed design system with utility classes for glow effects, buttons, and cards.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with oklch-based gold/dark color palettes, custom fonts, box shadows, and keyframe animations for a meme coin UI.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing the 'The Pointless Coin' meme coin website build, listing implemented features, architectural notes, known issues, and image requirements.
